workspace_url.title: Workspace URL
workspace_url.description: The URL of your Databricks workspace. For example: https://your-workspace.cloud.databricks.com

personal_access_token.title: Personal Access Token
personal_access_token.description: Your Databricks Personal Access Token (PAT). You can generate one in your Databricks workspace under User Settings > Access Tokens.

catalog.title: Catalog
catalog.description: The name of the catalog containing your data.

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: The name of the schema containing your data.

table.title: Table
table.description: The name of the table to sync.

cursor_field.title: Cursor Field
cursor_field.description: The field to use for incremental sync. This field should be a timestamp or date field that indicates when the record was last updated. Leave empty for full refresh sync.

warehouse_id.title: Warehouse ID
warehouse_id.description: The ID of the SQL warehouse to use for queries. You can find this in your Databricks workspace under SQL Warehouses.

batch_size.title: Batch Size
batch_size.description: The number of records to fetch in each batch. Larger batches may be faster but use more memory.
